races.analysis_summary: Torpedoes brings the strongest form lines into this maiden and draws well. Cathay Express showed improvement last start.

selections.name: Torpedoes
selections.reason: Consistent performer with ratings of 123, 127, and 125 in three career starts. Draws perfectly in barrier 5 to stalk the pace.

selections.name: Cathay Express
selections.reason: Improved significantly second up with a 120 rating. Should strip fitter here.

selections.name: Pretty Perky
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start with a 120 rating. Draws inside and maps well.

selections.name: Mikki Tango
selections.reason: Has shown ability previously (124 rating) but needs to bounce back from a flat run.

danger_horse.name: Cathay Express
danger_horse.reason: Rapid improver from a good stable.

races.analysis_summary: Light The Night carries weight but has the class edge. Beachbarbeckons produced a huge figure last start.

selections.name: Light The Night
selections.reason: Class runner of the field (Rating 131). Won this track/distance previously. Weight is the only concern.

selections.name: Beachbarbeckons
selections.reason: Coming off a dominant win with a massive 132 rating. If he repeats that, he wins.

selections.name: Regal Ripper
selections.reason: Last start winner (127 rating). Progressive type.

selections.name: Dampen
selections.reason: Very consistent with figures of 127 and 124. Will be in the finish.

danger_horse.name: Beachbarbeckons
danger_horse.reason: Speed figure from last start is superior to the field average.

races.analysis_summary: Competitive BM72. Captain Joolian is knocking on the door. Tapinforpar loves this track.

selections.name: Captain Joolian
selections.reason: Posted a huge 132 rating last start when finishing 2nd. Peak form.

selections.name: Tapinforpar
selections.reason: Won last start (126). Excellent track record (17: 3-1-5).

selections.name: The Sprinkler
selections.reason: Consistent 127 rating last start. Draws soft in barrier 2.

selections.name: Cielao
selections.reason: Solid 2nd last start. In the mix.

danger_horse.name: Tapinforpar
danger_horse.reason: Proven track specialist in winning form.

races.analysis_summary: Tricky 2YO race with first starters. Market will be the best guide. Ole Go has trialled well.

selections.name: Ole Go
selections.reason: $250k purchase. Won Murray Bridge trial. Stable strikes with these types.

selections.name: Expensive Taste
selections.reason: Another expensive purchase ($250k). Won jumpouts at Flemington.

selections.name: Image Artist
selections.reason: Has race experience (3rd on debut). That counts for plenty here.

selections.name: Big Wigs
selections.reason: 2nd in trial. Watch betting.

races.analysis_summary: She Rex brings strong interstate form. Rathlin Express is consistent.

selections.name: She Rex
selections.reason: Ex-Ciaron Maher runner. Placed at Warwick Farm. That form is superior to this field.

selections.name: Rathlin Express
selections.reason: Consistent ratings profile (125, 128, 128). Hard to knock.

selections.name: Tiddy Widdy
selections.reason: Placed 3 times in a row. Honest.

selections.name: Prestige Ka Ying
selections.reason: 2nd last start with 124 rating. Wide gate a concern.

danger_horse.name: Rathlin Express
danger_horse.reason: Very consistent figures make him a safe play.

races.analysis_summary: Teardrop Rotation brings strong Flemington form. Darknconfidential is the class runner.

selections.name: Teardrop Rotation
selections.reason: Ran 3rd at Flemington last start. Won at this track prior. Ideally drawn.

selections.name: Darknconfidential
selections.reason: Rating 127 last start in BM84 grade. Drops to BM78 but carries weight. Class runner.

selections.name: I Catchem Fox
selections.reason: 3rd last start with a 131 rating. Very competitive figures.

selections.name: Wild Winner
selections.reason: Forgive last start. Won prior with 123 rating.

danger_horse.name: Darknconfidential
danger_horse.reason: Highest rated horse in the race.

races.analysis_summary: Field decimated by scratches. Smother and Lucas the Younger look best of what's left.

selections.name: Smother
selections.reason: Consistent recent form (128 rating). Should handle the distance.

selections.name: Lucas the Younger
selections.reason: Veteran who rated 132 last start despite finishing 7th. 2nd prior.

selections.name: Mrs Penny Cracker
selections.reason: Last start winner. Up in grade but in form.

selections.name: Garcon Renard
selections.reason: 4th last start. Place chance.

races.analysis_summary: Sghirripa is a Group class horse resuming. If ready, he wins. Klabel is the fit danger.

selections.name: Sghirripa
selections.reason: The class runner (126 rating). Group performer. Won trial. Hard to beat.

selections.name: Klabel
selections.reason: Race fit and won last start with a 127 rating. The main danger.

selections.name: Lingani
selections.reason: Good fresh record. Can place.

selections.name: Great Maximus
selections.reason: Consistent type, usually around the mark.

races.analysis_summary: Chakado brings elite ratings. Florey and Conni Island are in winning form.

selections.name: Chakado
selections.reason: Ran a massive 136 rating at Flemington. Drops in grade. Top pick.

selections.name: Florey
selections.reason: Won last start (126). Draws well.

selections.name: Conni Island
selections.reason: Last start winner (123). Progressive.

selections.name: Mellifluent
selections.reason: Runner up last start (124). Inside gate helps.

danger_horse.name: Florey
danger_horse.reason: In winning form and maps well.

races.analysis_summary: Been Our Angel produced a huge rating last start. Mic Drop is also a last start winner.

selections.name: Been Our Angel
selections.reason: Won last start with a massive 136 rating. If he repeats that, he wins easily.

selections.name: Mic Drop
selections.reason: Won last start (127). Good form.

selections.name: Flashing Steel
selections.reason: Class runner (133 rating last start). Barrier is a nightmare.

selections.name: Daisydoo
selections.reason: Runner up last start (133). Strong figures.

danger_horse.name: Mic Drop
danger_horse.reason: Solid winning form and better draw than the top pick.

races.analysis_summary: Wide open race to close. Vexatious Dancer has the ratings on the board.

selections.name: Vexatious Dancer
selections.reason: Has a 132 rating two starts back. Best figures in the race.

selections.name: The Stalker
selections.reason: Consistent 126 rating last start. Solid chance.

selections.name: Zebella
selections.reason: 125 rating last start. Draws well.

selections.name: Angel Torque
selections.reason: Placed last start. Wide gate hurts.
